title: BRIEF-New Flyer announces additional 110 buses ordered for Washington, DC transit system
text:
BRIEF-New Flyer announces additional 110 buses ordered for Washington, DC transit system

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 17, 2019 18:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-New Flyer announces additional 110 buses ordered for Washington, DC transit system Sept 17 (Reuters) - NFI Group Inc : * NEW FLYER ANNOUNCES ADDITIONAL 110 BUSES ORDERED FOR WASHINGTON, DC TRANSIT SYSTEM * NFI GROUP INC - ORDER CONVERTS 110 BUSES FROM OPTION BACKLOG TO FIRM ORDERS

BRIEF-New Flyer announces additional 110 buses ordered for Washington, DC transit system
